baseline_groups.claim_summary: Cisterns (water infrastructure) reduce requests for private goods from politicians (clientelism).
baseline_groups.notes: Coef=-0.030 (p=0.018). Municipality + Year FE, clustered at neighborhood level. Stacked 2012+2013 data.

baseline_groups.claim_summary: Positive rainfall shocks reduce private goods requests (complementary to cisterns).

global_notes: Paper studies how reducing vulnerability (via cisterns and rainfall) decreases clientelism in rural Brazil. 92 specs. Main cistern effect robust across municipality drops (jackknife), controls, clustering. Alternative outcomes mixed. Rainfall effect shows complementary channel. Frequent interactors show much larger effects (-0.118). Household wellbeing outcomes also support the mechanism.
